title: Vision of the Absolute
content:
Absolute

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d8 (1d6) Piercing

Absolute Night: Blind targets that fail a Dexterity saving throw. Deals an additional 2-12 Piercing damage to certain creatures that sport multiple sets of eyes.

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The tip of this spear, covered with horrifying barbs, strikes unerringly towards its target's eyes.

Spear Thrown Versatile
